title: Thanks for such a New Year Riot
body:
i got permanetly  banned I didn't deserve it after so many years, in the  end its new year meybe little kindnesssss  form your side  and  u take banne from me  last chance,I understand I broke the rules and  im  realy  sad for that. is there any chance to  unbanne me and  give me a little  cristmas  gift ? im  player from beta  legue of legends :) {{champion:32}}

Hello, once again. I fully understand your decision why you banned me, but I would appreciate it if you can hear me pit: I have been playing the game for a long time now. I looked over the reports you sent, and honestly, I am ashamed of myself, and I shouldn't have acted like this. I have been through tough days later; my friend died in a car accident where I also was sitting; therefore, I was angry and irritated about everything. I was trying to cheer myself up with playing the game. If you reinstate my account, I won't do that again, ever! The reason I want to continue playing the game is that my friend and I started playing the game at the same time, and some of the skins that he gifted it to me. I don't want them to be lost like this and my account to be deactivated. Once again, I sincerely apologize to the whole team of Riot, and I would appreciate it if you took this message into consideration.{{champion:29}}
